name: Direct Stream Digital Interchange File Format, DSDIFF, Version 1.5
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://www.sonicstudio.com/pdf/dsd/DSDIFF_1.5_Spec.pdf, http://www.sonicstudio.com/pdf/dsd/DSDIFF_1.5_RecommendedUsage.pdf</field><field name="filenameExtension">dff, dft, df0, df1, df2, df3, df4, df5, df6, df7, df8, df9</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Format Description for DSDIFF - Format for the storage or exchange of one-bit delta sigma modulated audio, often called Direct Stream Digital, or for the losslessly compressed version called Direct Stream Transfer (DST).
